translation: Yesterday, I went to the store with a friend to buy an apple, a banana, and milk. After that, we walked to the park, sat, talked, laughed, and enjoyed the beautiful sunset.
This morning, I woke up at six in the morning, brushed my teeth, took a shower, ate breakfast, which consisted of cereal, milk, and juice, then left the house to go to school by bus.
My friend is coming to my house on Friday evening. We will play video games, cook dinner with pizza and salad, and watch a movie. It will be a fun night.
